notes: Very modern luxury building with upscale lobby featuring concierge desk, designer furniture, and water feature. The apartment interior has clean laminate flooring, recessed lighting, AC, and modern fixtures. Balcony has glass railings which provide good safety for a baby. Building appears to be 8 floors with elevator access based on the lobby setup. Good natural light through floor-to-ceiling balcony doors. Red foam play mat visible suggests family-friendly space.
